title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.103 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.103 - General

State Regulations

Pipe must be designed with sufficient wall thickness, or
must be installed with adequate protection to withstand anticipated external
pressures and loads that will be imposed on the pipe after
installation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.103

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
